author: Chester Higgins
title: No One Saw America as Clearly as Robert Frank
description: The work of this legendary photographer is proof that a photograph never lies about the photographer.
content:
There are just a few photographers who create a body of work that commands your attention. For me, the legendary Robert Frank was one of them.

title: ECB cuts key interest rate to record low of -0.5%
description: Bond purchases will be restarted as part of stimulus package

So far, they are the only local group to go up against al-Shabab fighters and win.

description: Sissons also presenter on ITN and Channel 4
content:

title: Former Ryder Cup star Brian Barnes dies aged 74
description: Nine-time European Tour winner famously beat Jack Nicklaus twice in one day
content:
Brian Barnes, who famously beat Jack Nicklaus twice in one day in the Ryder Cup, has died at the age of 74.
Barnes, who won the Senior British Open in 1995 and defended the title the following year, died from cancer on Monday afternoon after a short illness.
